item.title: Useful Hugo Templating
item.description: Developing templates for the static website generator Hugo? Then these advanced tips & tricks might be helpful to you.

item.title: Redesign March 2020
item.description: On this day three years ago, I launched my blog. Today, I publish its first redesign: bigger, bolder, bluer, and (hopefully) better than its predecessor.

item.title: Tools for the Smart Start-up in 2018 (II)
item.description: Small budgets can get you great IT infrastructure. Running great desktop and web applications on top can be very inexpensive, too. Hereâ€™s how.

item.title: Tools for the Smart Start-up in 2018 (I)
item.description: If you start a project on a small budget today in 2018, there is no need to do without state-of-the-art IT infrastructure for your team. Let me give you some ideas.

item.title: Years in the Making, Launching Today: The Ypertex Blog
item.description: After years of intending to start blogging, I finally and proudly publish the first article on my own blog. When are you going to start?
